sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RTPN_ACC_ACCNO , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , RTPN_ACC_RTPN_CL , RTPN_FNN_ORGN_CD , RTPN_ACC_FNN_CMP , RTPN_ACC_PYM_AMT , RTPN_ACC_TXAMT_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RTPN_ACC_TGT_AMT ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #rtpnAccAccno# , #taxVvalKrnCd# , #rtpnAccRtpnCl# , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'Y005' AND COMM_CD = #rtpnFnnOrgnCd#) , #rtpnAccFnnCmp# , #rtpnAccPymAmt# , #rtpnAccTxamtDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #rtpnAccTgtAmt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162020 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , RTPN_ACC_ACCNO=#rtpnAccAccno# , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd# , RTPN_ACC_RTPN_CL=#rtpnAccRtpnCl# , RTPN_FNN_ORGN_CD=#rtpnFnnOrgnCd# , RTPN_ACC_FNN_CMP=#rtpnAccFnnCmp# , RTPN_ACC_PYM_AMT=#rtpnAccPymAmt# , RTPN_ACC_TXAMT_DDC_AMT=#rtpnAccTxamtDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RTPN_ACC_ACCNO=#rtpnAccAccno#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RTPN_ACC_ACCNO=#rtpnAccAccno#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RTPN_ACC_ACCNO , RTPN_ACC_RTPN_CL , RTPN_FNN_ORGN_CD , RTPN_ACC_FNN_CMP , RTPN_ACC_PYM_AMT , RTPN_ACC_TXAMT_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RTPN_ACC_ACCNO=#rtpnAccAccno#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RTPN_ACC_ACCNO , RTPN_ACC_RTPN_CL , RTPN_FNN_ORGN_CD , RTPN_ACC_FNN_CMP , RTPN_ACC_PYM_AMT , RTPN_ACC_TXAMT_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , RTPN_ACC_ACCNO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
